THE_TYPE_OF_TARGET_DEVICEC_DOES_NOT_MATC.message:
The type of target device does not match the device type configured by module: %s.
Required device type:%s, current module device type:%s
solutions: Make sure the deviceTypes field set in module.json5 under src/main of the module directory contains the required type.
Make sure the device types specified under target in the build-profile.json5 file of the module directory contain the required one.
Check whether the hvigorfile.ts or hvigorconfig.ts file contains any code that may change the module deviceTypes settings.

USENORMAILZEDOHMURL_CAN_ONLY_BE_USED_IN_.message:
UseNormalizedOHMUrl can be true only when Compatible SDK Version is 5.0.0 (12) or later. 
	at %s.
solutions: If Compatible SDK Version is 4.1.0(11) or earlier, set useNormalizedOHMUrl to false.

THE_LOCAL_DEPENDENCY_BELOW_IN_MODULE_%S_.message:
The local dependency below in module %s is invalid. It may cause an ohpm install error when being integrated.
%s
solutions: Make sure the local dependencies specified under dependencies and dynamicDependencies in the oh-package.json5 file of the module are all in the current module directory.
Troubleshoot the errors according to the following guidelines.

THERE_ARE_SOME_DEPENDENCY_NAMES_THAT_ARE.message: There are some dependency names that are inconsistent with the actual package names.
solutions: Local dependency "%s" found in "%s" does not match the actual name "%s" of its oh-package.json5, change it to "%s".

LOCAL_DEPENDENCY_IN_PARAMETER_FILE_DOES_.message: Local dependency in parameterFile does not exist.
solutions: File path: "%s" configured in "%s" does not exist, the parameterKey is "%s".
Check if the local dependency path exists.
Check if the local dependency path is case-sensitive.
File path: "%s" configured in "%s" is unrecognized archive format, the parameterKey is "%s".

INVALID_VALUE_OF_%S_IN_THESYSTEM_ENVIRON.message: Invalid value of '%s' in the system environment path.
solutions: Correct the value, run hvigorw --stop-daemon to stop the daemon process, and then try again.

USENORMAILZEDOHMURL_DO_NOT_MATCH.message: The useNormalizedOHMUrl settings of packages [%s] and the project useNormalizedOHMUrl:%s do not match.
solutions: Use the packages that match the project settings. If useNormalizedOHMUrl is not set, the default value false is used.

THE_REASON_AND_USESCENE_ATTRIBUTES_ARE_M.message:
The reason and usedScene attributes are mandatory for user_grant permissions. 
 at %s
solutions: For the hap module, add the reason and usedScene fields to the permission reported in the preceding file.
For the har/hsp module, add the reason field to the permission of the error information in the preceding file.
Perhaps you can check the parameter configuration of arguments in module level build-profile.json5

Change the 'routerMap' object names listed below under routerMap in the respective router configuration files. Make sure the names are unique across the current module and the modules on which it depends.
  %s

FAILED_TO_OBTAIL_THE_MODULE_TYPE.message: Failed to obtain the module type.
solutions:
Make sure the module is in the FA model and the module/distro/moduleType field in the config.json file is correctly configured.
at %s

THE_%S_PERMISSION_UNDER_REQUESTPERMISSIO.message:
The %s permission under requestPermissions must be a value that is predefined within the SDK or a custom one that you have included under definePermissions.
at %s
solutions: Modify the permission configuration in the preceding file.

THE_REASON_ATTRIBUTE_ARE_MANDATORY_FOR_U.message:
The reason attribute are mandatory for user_grant permissions. 
 at %s
solutions: For the hap module, add the reason and usedScene fields to the permission reported in the preceding file.
For the har/hsp module, add the reason field to the permission of the error information in the preceding file.

THE_METADATE_FIELD_IN_FORMEXTENSIONABILI.message:
The metadata field in FormExtensionAbility cannot be left blank or as an empty array.
at %s

IN_FORMEXTENSIONABILITY_METADATA_MUST_CO.message:
In FormExtensionAbility, metadata must contain an object with its name set to 'ohos.extension.form' and resource set to a second-level resource reference.
at %s

BYTECODE_HARS_%S_NOT_SUPPORTED_WHEN_USEN.message: Bytecode HARs: [%s] not supported when useNormalizedOHMUrl is not true.
solutions: Please check useNormalizedOHMUrl in the project-level build-profile.json5 file.

Change the 'Module-Abilities' object names listed below under abilities in the respective module.json5. Make sure the names are unique across the current module and the modules on which it depends.
  %s
Make sure the name has been configured in the form_config.json file.

FOUND_HSPS_THAT_HAVE_THE_SAME_HAR_DEPEND.message:
Found HSPs that have the same HAR %s
%s
solutions: Follow the best practice at moreInfo.

WRONG_STRING_JSON_FORMAT.message: File 'string.json' is missing the required property 'string'.

AUTO_LAZY_IMPORT_CANNOT_BE_CONFIGURED_FO.message: autoLazyImport cannot be configured for the current API version. autoLazyImport can be used in the beta3 version of API 12 or higher versions.
solutions: Check the compatibleSdkVersion and compatibleSdkVersionStage in project's build-profile.json5
If the compatibleSdkVersion is set to API 12, configure the compatibleSdkVersionStage needs to beta3, or
Set autoLazyImport to false to disable it.

DUPLICATED_FILES_DOUND_IN_LIBPATH.message:
Duplicated files found in module %s. This may cause unexpected errors at runtime. 
 %s
solutions: Set .so file priorities with pickFirsts, pickLasts, or select option.
Make sure each .so file name is unique.

Change the value ('%s') of '%s' at '%s'. Make sure it starts with a letter or digit, contains a maximum of 60 characters consisting of only letters, digits, periods (.), hyphens (-), and underscores (_), and is not 'latest.'

THE_TAG_KEYWORD_IS_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_VERSI.message: The 'tag' keyword is not allowed for 'version' at '%s'.
solutions: Change '%s' to a non-tag value for '%s' at '%s'.

Make sure the module is in the stage model and the module.json5 file exists.
at %s

A_UNKNOWN_TYPE_NAME_ERROR_HAS_OCCURRED.message: A 'unknown type name' error has occurred.
solutions: Troubleshoot the errors according to the following guidelines.

OH_PACKAGE_NAME_NOT_STRING.message: Error in %s. The name of the module must be a string, but received a %s.
solutions: Verify the 'name' in oh-package.json5 files.

OH_PACKAGE_VERSION_NOT_STRING.message: Error in %s. The version number of the module must be a string, but received a %s.
solutions: Verify the 'version' in oh-package.json5 files.

THIS_PROJECT_IS_IN_THE_FA_MODEL_AND_DOES.message: This project is in the FA model and does not allow for external dependencies.
solutions: Remove external dependencies
Use a project in the stage project.

THIS_PROJECT_IS_IN_THE_STAGE_MODEL_AND_D.message: This project is in the stage model and does not allow for dependencies of modules in the FA model.
solutions: Use dependencies of modules in the stage model instead

CANNOT_DEPEND_ON_HAP_MODULES_OUTSIDE_OF_.message: Cannot depend on HAP modules outside of this project
solutions: Use dependencies of HSP or HAR modules instead.
Verify the Internet connection.
Verify the repository address, package name, and version number.

SHORTCUTS_FILE_NOT_FOUND.message: Invalid shortcuts path. Check the configuration '%s' in module '%s''s module.json5. The path of file '%s' is not valid.
solutions: Check whether the path of field exist and configure to a valid path.
